General.Name: Nobel29 Resources Corp
General.Description: Nobel Resources Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It has an option to acquire interest in the Pircas Verdes Property located in Chile. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
